modName: Legend Of the Eagles Nest General Stores Edition
summary: This mods adds Displays from the mod General Stores to the player home Legends Of the Eagles Nest. (Some displays only show after spring cleaning the nest). Also, Adds a Docking Ramp for the Driverable Dwemer Airship Mod Dev Aveza. I also cleaned the esp.
descriptionHtml:
[color=yellow][u][b]Legend Of the Eagles Nest General Stores Edition by See Credits Version 1.01[/b][/u][/color]

Credit goes to Flaho Shi and all those in his credits for this mod I only added support for general stores and make some minor changes and fixes.

___Update____
1.01 Small fix to fix the loud wind sound in riverwood let me know if i got it all.

[color=yellow][u][b]----Install Instuctions---[/b][/u][/color]
(This is a remake so it is not compatible with the original esp you must uncheck it save your game and then activate the new version yes you will need to do the quest again)
Use Nmm to install mod Pack and Legends of the eagles Nest Orginial mod.
Uncheck ---Flaho Shi - Legend of the Eagle Nest.esp
If you get yellow Triangles you need to rename the Bsa from the original mod in you skyrim data folder to Legends Of the Eagles Nest GS Edition the same as the main Esp file.

[color=yellow][u][b]Must Have checked in your load order!!![/b][/u][/color]
General Stores.esm
Legends Of the Eagles Nest GS Edition.esp


General Stores esm Required. Download Has it. (You will crash without it) No DLC Required. Must have your Skyrim Up to date and be a Legal Version.
[url=http://http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/34834/?] [color=red][u][b]Link Here--- For Bsa you need From Legends Of the Eagles Nest [/b][/u][/color][/url] You will need the Bsa from the orginial file Legend of the eagles Nest if You get Yellow triangles rename bsa to Legends of the Eagles Nest GS Edition.
[url=http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/18340//?] [color=Blue][u][b]Link Here---Mod General Stores ESM [/b][/u][/color][/url] In Main file here for endorsements


----This is an edit of Legend of the Eagles Nest (Which you will need the bsa from for the mod to work).
This mods adds Displays from the mod General Stores to the player home. (Some displays only show after spring cleaning the nest).
I have also added a dock for the mod Dev Aveza-- Dwemer Airship
And Cleaned Esp

[color=yellow][u][b]----What is general store? -----[/b][/u][/color]
Answer: General Stores and Cloud storage system that safely sorts and stores all you items in cloud containers. Allowing you to get your items from any general store container from anywhere. Example if you use a mod that has general store containers you can get your items from the container in that mod and this mod safely. As they are saved in the general store esm not the mods themselfs.

[color=yellow][u][b]----Auto Sorting-----[/b][/u][/color]
First off, I didn't make the scripts nor do I fully understand the scripts for the auto sorting. How the sorting works the armor can be sorted with the Dragonbone armor dummy. Weapons have to be manually sorted by placing the items in the weapon sorting rack not sure why the sort all doesn't work for weapons. The unburden option lets you sort all crafting supplies. It will take some learning to get use to but it is the best sorting system I have seen so far.

As, always please report bugs and anything missing in the bsa so I can fix.



[color=yellow][u][b]Please endorse IF you like.[/b][/u][/color]


Well tested by me.
(As I have all the loose file for the creation kit I can't test bsa so let me know if you get Yellow ! mark or the quest doesn't work). Remember You need the Bsa From the Orginial Mod Link above. You may also need to rename bsa to name of the ESP file.



[color=yellow][u][b]---Plans to do in Future Updates---[/b][/u][/color]
Fix any error reported.
Open to suggestions.


[color=yellow][u][b]---Update Info.---[/b][/u][/color]
See Changes Tab.


[color=yellow][u][b]----Known Issues None.[/b][/u][/color]
